column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: suicide prevention. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix sp: <http://www.example.com/suicidePrevention#> .sp:SuicidePrevention a rdfs:Class .sp:PublicAwareness a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:SuicidePrevention .sp:MentalHealthAssessment a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:SuicidePrevention .sp:Hotline a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:SuicidePrevention .sp:Training a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:SuicidePrevention .sp:Counseling a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:SuicidePrevention .sp:Helplines a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:Hotline .sp:ImmediateHelp a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:Hotline .sp:StressManagementClasses a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:Training .sp:CrisisInterventionTraining a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:Training .sp:PsychiatristConsultation a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:Counseling .sp:SupportGroups a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:Counseling .sp:RiskAssessment a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:MentalHealthAssessment .sp:DepressionScreening a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf sp:MentalHealthAssessment .sp:awarenessCampaigns a sp:PublicAwareness ;    sp:name "National Suicide Prevention Week" .sp:nationalHotline a sp:Helplines ;    sp:contactNumber "1-800-273-TALK" .sp:localSupportGroup a sp:SupportGroups ;    sp:location "CommunityHealthCenter, CityName, StateName" .
